participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, with a tendency to overthink social situations.
participant_1.background: I'm going to visit a friend in the city this weekend. I'm curious about how to overcome my shyness. I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement. I will graduate from college in two years. I love to read the bible before I go to bed.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys making connections with others and is supportive.
participant_2.background: I like to change my hair color often, but I always come back to my favorite color, which is blue. I spend time with my dogs, which helps me feel better. I am a father who enjoys taking my child to the zoo to see koalas even though I would rather sleep in. I like to go out and have fun, but I also take care of my health by eating healthy and exercising regularly. I like to read pet training blogs and websites.

content.text: Hey! I'm going to visit a friend in the city this weekend.
Oh that's exciting! What are you going to do?
We're going to go to a few museums and see a play.
That sounds like fun! I love going to museums.
Me too! I'm curious about how to overcome my shyness. Do you have any advice?
Sure! I used to be really shy too, but I've found that the best way to overcome it is to just put yourself out there and talk to people.
That's true. I guess I just need to get out of my comfort zone more.
Exactly! And it doesn't have to be big things. Just start by making small talk with people you see every day.
I'll try that. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! Have fun in the city this weekend!
